Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $15,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly benefit your endeavors. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to acquire the product at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer not only secures an excellent deal but also ensures you receive a high-quality item that meets your needs and expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
